min_typing_speed.description: Minimum delay between keystrokes in seconds. Lower = faster typing.

max_typing_speed.description: Maximum delay between keystrokes. Creates natural speed variation.

min_chunk_size.description: Minimum number of words to type before taking a pause.
min_chunk_size.example: 10 = type at least 10 words before pausing

max_chunk_size.description: Maximum number of words to type before taking a pause.
max_chunk_size.example: 20 = type up to 20 words before pausing

min_pause.description: Minimum pause duration (in seconds) between chunks of words.

max_pause.description: Maximum pause duration between chunks. Simulates longer thinking breaks.

error_rate.description: Probability (0-1) of making a typo for each character typed.

correction_delay.description: How long to wait (in seconds) before correcting a typo.
correction_delay.example: 1.0 = wait one second before fixing mistake

max_error_chars.description: Maximum number of wrong characters to type when making a typo.
max_error_chars.example: 2 = up to 2 wrong characters before correction
